about_the_game:
Classic Strategy Magic Card Battle Game LOA come to Steam!Players in battle of LOA need to make a strong deck to fight with strong enemys.Cards have 6 races,each races have distinctive features and different activities.By using contract cards and gears to get stronger,also have BOSS battle,Maze Explore,Thieves,Dungeon,Elemental Tower,Inifinity Palace,Wave of Evils and Roguelike in game!

Rich and Exquisite Card System

By using Wish to consume StarsStone to get a large amount of cards and items.Beautiful cards in the game,Tales from the East,Sword and Magic,Gods Battle and so on.The exquisite open faces drawn by famous painters must be your favorite!

Challenging Storylines

New version enriches the plot story again. In order to save her hometown,Yimi invite the brave to start the Magic Card journey again.Hundreds of different plot levels and nightmare difficulty maps are waiting for you to breakthrough.There are more hidden levels waiting for you to discover!

Feature-packed Game

Game has rich and complete PVE functions,novel and ingenious design,roguelike creative gameplay,waiting for you to challenge!From Theives to Raider,Mystery Tower to Misterioso,Maze to Star Expedition,Dungeon to Elemental Tower,Infinity Palace to Wave of Evils,show your stronge deck to fight.Also,Season maps waiting for you to challenge!Great Rewards waiting for you to get!

Now come to experience pure classic card battles!Authentic strategic battles are waiting for you!

  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 | AMD A4-7300
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 1903 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 或 AMD Ryzen R5-1600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
